title: Starlight Paradox
author: Nova Ardent
summary: A daring pilot discovers a hidden galaxy that could change the fate of humanity.

title: Love in the Mist
author: Clara Bennett
summary: Two strangers meet on a rainy night and discover that love can heal even the deepest scars.

title: Echoes Of The Stars
author: Luna Drayke
summary: An Astronaut Lost In Deep Space Begins Receiving Mysterious Transmissions From A Parallel Universe.

title: Echoes of Eternity
author: Liam Cross
summary: A fallen knight embarks on a quest through realms of magic to restore his lost honor and save a forgotten kingdom.

title: Digital Mirage
author: Ava Chen
summary: In a future where memories can be traded, a hacker discovers a secret that could collapse the entire digital economy.

title: Hearts in Twilight
author: Sophie Lane
summary: When a writer escapes to a seaside town, she falls for a mysterious artist with a hidden past.

title: The Quantum Thief
author: Rafael Vega
summary: A brilliant scientist must steal his own invention back from a corporation before it destroys time itself.
